File transfer protocol (FTP) is a standard method used for transferring files over the internet. Businesses require a reliable and secure FTP client to transfer files between servers, workstations, and remote locations. FTP Voyager is an advanced FTP client that provides secure, reliable, and efficient file transfer capabilities.

## What is FTP Voyager?

FTP Voyager is a comprehensive FTP client that enables businesses to transfer files quickly and securely. Developed by RhinoSoft, this client offers a user-friendly interface and numerous features, including secure file transfer protocols, automatic scheduling, and synchronization capabilities.

RhinoSoft developed FTP Voyager with businesses in mind, and it offers advanced features that help streamline file transfer processes. FTP Voyager also offers another product, Serv-U Managed File Transfer (MFT), for businesses that require more advanced file transfer capabilities.

## Key Features of FTP Voyager

Some key features of FTP Voyager include:

### Secure File Transfer

FTP Voyager provides secure file transfer capabilities with support for secure file transfer protocols (SFTP, FTPS) and SSL/TLS encryption. It ensures the confidentiality and integrity of files during transfer.

### Automatic Scheduling

FTP Voyager allows users to schedule file transfers automatically. You can specify the frequency, time, and date of transfers, making it easy to automate your file transfer processes.

### Sync and Backup

FTP Voyager enables users to synchronize files and folders in real-time, ensuring that the files are up-to-date. It also offers a backup feature that allows you to backup files automatically, ensuring you always have a backup of your critical files.

### Ad-hoc File Sharing

FTP Voyager offers an ad-hoc file sharing feature that enables you to share files with external users without granting full FTP access. It is a secure way to share files and folders without exposing your network to unauthorized access.

### User Management

FTP Voyager offers an extensive user management system that allows you to set permissions and access controls for users. It ensures that users only have access to the files and folders that they need.

## Conclusion

FTP Voyager is a user-friendly and reliable FTP client that offers secure file transfer protocols, automatic scheduling, synchronization capabilities, and ad-hoc file sharing. It is an ideal solution for businesses of all sizes, providing comprehensive file transfer capabilities that help streamline your file transfer processes. Try FTP Voyager today for a more efficient file transfer experience.
